en.#subHeader:
The customers can rate the service experience either via
the in-store tablet or with their own phones by scanning a QR code
en.#tryTheQRflow: Try out the mobile rating flow by scanning this QR code with the camera on your smartphone
en.#motivatedText: Employees installs the Servicelovers mobile app on thier phones and can now recieve personal ratings comming from the customers, build their service CV, and manage their Servicelovers profile.
en.#dashboardText:
You get full access to the Servicelovers web admin panel where all the ratings can be viewed. From the dashboard you can:

  • See what customers think about the service level in your business
  • See what stores performs the best
  • See what customers might find lacking in your business
  • Manage your tablets eg. setup premade feedback answers eg. “The que was too long” or “The product was not in stock” etc.
en.#contactHeader: Contact us if you want to hear more about the possibilities for your business

dk.#subHeader:
Kunderne kan rate deres serviceoplevelse via vores
in-store tablet eller med deres egen telefon ved at scanne en QR kode
dk.#tryTheQRflow:
Prøv selv det mobile rating flow ved at
scanne QR koden med dit mobilkamera
dk.#motivatedText: Medarbejderne intallerer Servicelovers mobil appen på deres telefon og kan derefter modtage personlige anbefalinger vi appen
dk.#dashboardText:
Du får adgang til admin panelet hvor alle kundernes anbefaliner, kommentarer og feedback kommer ind. Via admin panelet kan du f.eks.:

  • Se hvad dine kunder synes om serviceniveauet i din forretning
  • Se hvilke af dine butkker som klarer sig bedst
  • Se hvad dine kunder evt. synes som mangler i din forretning
  • Justere dit rating flow og f.eks. tilpasse feedback spørgsmål: “For lang ventetid” eller “Produktet var ikke på lager” osv.
dk.#contactHeader: Kontakt os hvis du vil høre mere om mulighederne for netop din virksomhed
